name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **CI/CD** processes using **Jenkins**. Proficient in **Python**, **Bash**, and **Node.js**, delivering cloud-native systems and managing infrastructure as code. Experienced in implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, as well as deploying robust monitoring solutions with **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Graphite**. Skilled in ensuring cloud security and compliance across solutions, aligning with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. 
Strong background in full stack development with hands-on expertise in technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, combined with a focus on AI/ML implementations for advanced analytics and automation.
